post_body: La T-usual i la T-jove mantindran les bonificacions del 50% durant tot el 2025

comment.body: This means that the T-usual for 1 zone will cost still 21 euros every 30 days even on 2025?
Poca broma, són 240€ a l'any que ens estalviem. Tan de bo fos per sempre.
Visca la psoe potser els voto

For at least the first 6 months of the year, yes. Also the cheap Rodalies ticket.


Edit: I read in a different article it was only the first 6 months, but maybe that's changed.
Nice thanks for the info mate!
